cause.description:
This cause is good for the worldwide cause of peace and harmony because it supports the right people, in the right places. If you believe in what is right, you should join, because were always right. ON SECOND THOUGHT, most of you should not join because you do not believe in what is right, but those who do, join right away!
1. We believe that we have the right to believe
2. We think that the law of laws should not be goverend by law
3. We KNOW that the knowledge of the world is not just knowledge but understanding
4. Yeah, thats right.
cause.mission: To make the world a better place by supporting someone, somewhere.
cause.name: Anthony's fund for having a positive attitude, with strong Chrlstlan overtones.
